page.title: 12MEDIA
page.content: {MEDIA }Television is now standard in homes, many have more than one set and children have their own. Videos are in 60% of homes and Radios with audio recorders and record players are in most homes. Computers are owned by 40% but are used for games generally. Local news papers give but scant coverage and Leverton being on the edge of a number of areas, we do not rate media interest . A Magazine has been published by the church for years and the school has done so for 25 years, using stories and accounts of school visits during the year. The magazine is duplicated and sold in the village. Mobile library service visit the area every two weeks and more during school holidays. School hold a library collection.
